intents.name: Do I need to be physically present to open a compa
intents.response: Physical presence is not required to set up a company.
keywords: do i need to be physically present to open a company
do i have to be in dubai to open a company
can i open a company remotely
is physical presence required

intents.name: Are there any paid-up share capital requirements
intents.response: No paid-up share capital is required.
keywords: are there any paid-up share capital requirements
do i need paid-up capital
is paid-up share capital mandatory

intents.name: Do shareholders need NOC to incorporate a company
intents.response: NOC is not required to incorporate a company.
keywords: do shareholders need noc to incorporate a company
is noc required to open a company
do individual or corporate shareholders require noc

intents.name: Can I apply for a zero visa license
intents.response: Yes, you can get a license with a zero-visa at Meydan Free Zone.
keywords: can i apply for a zero visa license
is a 0 visa license allowed
can i get a license without visas

intents.name: Can I combine commercial, professional, and tradin
intents.response: Yes, the combination of activities is permitted.
keywords: can i combine commercial professional and trading activities
can i combine multiple activities on one license
can i mix activities on the same license

intents.name: What documents will I receive after company incorp
intents.response: Business License, Certificate of Formation, Share Register, Memorandum of Association, Lease Agreement.
keywords: what documents will i receive after company incorporation
what documents do i get after company setup
what papers are issued after incorporation

intents.name: How many shareholders are allowed
intents.response: A maximum of 100 shareholders are permitted. If more than 6 shareholders, AED 2000 is charged for each additional shareholder.
keywords: how many shareholders are allowed
maximum shareholders on a license

intents.name: How many directors are allowed
intents.response: A maximum of 4 directors are permitted.
keywords: how many directors are allowed
director limit per license

intents.name: How many managers are allowed
intents.response: A maximum of 1 manager is permitted.
keywords: how many managers are allowed
manager limit per company

intents.name: How many activities are included free of cost
intents.response: You can incorporate the company with 3 groups of activities without any additional charge.
keywords: how many activities are included free of cost
free activity groups

intents.name: What is the cost of adding additional activities
intents.response: The cost of additional activities is AED 1000 per activity. Approvals are required only for regulated activities.
keywords: what is the cost of adding additional activities
additional activity fee

intents.name: Is there a discount for multi-year license applica
intents.response: For multi-year license applications, 2 or more years, there is a standard discount of 15%.
keywords: is there a discount for multi-year license applications
multi year license discount

intents.name: Can I be a partner in more than one company
intents.response: Yes, you can be a partner or shareholder in multiple companies.
keywords: can i be a partner in more than one company
can i own multiple companies

intents.name: What is the next step after submitting the license
intents.response: Shareholders, managers, and directors receive an email for KYC, acceptance, and compliance. Once completed, the application is reviewed.
keywords: what is the next step after submitting the license application
what happens after applying for a license

intents.name: What is the maximum license validity
intents.response: The maximum license validity is 10 years.
keywords: what is the maximum license validity
license validity period

intents.name: Will a multi-year license company get a free amend
intents.response: Yes, if the company holds a multi-year license, they will get a free amendment.
keywords: will a multi-year license company get a free amendment
free amendment with multi year license

intents.name: Is there a grace period after the license expires
intents.response: A 30-day grace period is provided from the license expiry date.
keywords: is there a grace period after the license expires
license renewal grace period

intents.name: Is there a penalty if the license is not renewed o
intents.response: Yes, the penalty fee is AED 500. This is a one-time fee.
keywords: is there a penalty if the license is not renewed on time
license late renewal penalty

intents.name: Is there a grace period after the immigration card
intents.response: No, there is no grace period provided when the immigration card expires.
keywords: is there a grace period after the immigration card expires

intents.name: Is there a penalty if the immigration card expires
intents.response: Yes, the penalty fee is AED 250 per month from the immigration card expiry date.
keywords: is there a penalty if the immigration card expires

intents.name: Can share allocation or total share capital be fra
intents.response: No, share allocation and the total share capital cannot be a fraction.
keywords: can share allocation or total share capital be fractional
can shares be in decimals

intents.name: What address will be mentioned in the company lice
intents.response: Meydan Grandstand, Next to Meydan Hotel, 6th Floor, Meydan Road, Nad Al Sheba, Dubai, U.A.E.
keywords: what address will be mentioned in the company license
office address on license

intents.name: When is the Audit Financial Statement Declaration
intents.response: At the time of license renewal.
keywords: when is the audit financial statement declaration required
audit declaration timing

intents.name: Can the client convert LLC to Branch or Branch to
intents.response: No, it is not possible.
keywords: can the client convert llc to branch or branch to llc

intents.name: Can I have a shop outside the Meydan Free Zone
intents.response: No, you need to have a shop within the Meydan Free Zone area.
keywords: can i have a shop outside the meydan free zone

intents.name: Can the client change the address in the business
intents.response: Yes, the address can be changed, but it must be in the Meydan Free Zone area only.
keywords: can the client change the address in the business license

intents.name: Will I receive a Chamber of Commerce certificate
intents.response: No, a Chamber of Commerce certificate will not be issued.
keywords: will i receive a chamber of commerce certificate

intents.name: Can I hold property under my Meydan Free Zone comp
intents.response: Yes, you can hold property under your company.
keywords: can i hold property under my meydan free zone company

intents.name: How many visa allocations are available to the com
intents.response: 6 visa allocations.
keywords: how many visa allocations are available to the company

intents.name: Can I get a DET permit with general trading activi
intents.response: No, it is not possible.
keywords: can i get a det permit with general trading activity

intents.name: What is an immigration card
intents.response: The immigration card is mandatory before applying for employment or investor visas.
keywords: what is an immigration card

intents.name: What is visa allocation
intents.response: Visa allocation is the visa quota in immigration and is mandatory before applying for visas.
keywords: what is visa allocation

intents.name: Do immigration card and visa allocation have diffe
intents.response: Immigration card and visa allocation have the same validity as the business license.
keywords: do immigration card and visa allocation have different validity

intents.name: How long does a company name change amendment take
intents.response: Publication time is 14 days.
keywords: how long does a company name change amendment take

intents.name: Can a company provide its own MOA
intents.response: No, the company cannot provide its own MOA.
keywords: can a company provide its own moa

intents.name: What are the fees for renewal with amendment
intents.response: There are no extra fees unless a fourth activity group is added.
keywords: what are the fees for renewal with amendment

intents.name: What is the validity of corporate and employee let
intents.response: The validity is 30 days.
keywords: what is the validity of corporate and employee letters

intents.name: What should be the validity of a board resolution
intents.response: The board resolution must be valid for 15 days.
keywords: what should be the validity of a board resolution

intents.name: If license is cancelled after expiry, is penalty a
intents.response: No penalty applies for the license, but immigration card fines must be paid if applicable.
keywords: if license is cancelled after expiry is penalty applicable

intents.name: Do visa allocations need to be renewed annually
intents.response: Yes, visa allocation must be renewed annually along with the license and immigration card.
keywords: do visa allocations need to be renewed annually

intents.name: Is immigration card amendment required after compa
intents.response: Yes, the company must apply for an immigration card amendment.
keywords: is immigration card amendment required after company name change

intents.name: Is there a minimum or maximum age for shareholders
intents.response: There is no minimum and no maximum age.
keywords: is there a minimum or maximum age for shareholders

intents.name: Is there a minimum or maximum share capital
intents.response: There is no minimum and no maximum share capital requirement.
keywords: is there a minimum or maximum share capital

intents.name: Do I need to be inside the UAE to process the Resi
intents.response: Entry visa can be processed outside the country, but applicant must be inside UAE after e-visa issuance.
keywords: do i need to be inside the uae to process the residence visa

intents.name: How long is the Entry Visa valid
intents.response: The entry permit is valid for 60 days.
keywords: how long is the entry visa valid

intents.name: How long is change of status valid
intents.response: Change of status is valid for 60 days.
keywords: how long is change of status valid

intents.name: Do we need to submit original passport during visa
intents.response: Visa stamping is no longer mandatory.
keywords: do we need to submit original passport during visa application

intents.name: Can residence visa be processed before biometrics
intents.response: Yes, by signing the Emirates ID declaration form.
keywords: can residence visa be processed before biometrics

intents.name: How much time to complete biometrics
intents.response: The client has 60 days to complete biometrics.
keywords: how much time to complete biometrics

intents.name: Minimum age for investor or partner visa
intents.response: The minimum age is 18 years with AED 50,000 share capital.
keywords: minimum age for investor or partner visa

intents.name: Maximum age for investor or partner visa
intents.response: There is no age limitation.
keywords: maximum age for investor or partner visa

intents.name: Minimum age for employee visa
intents.response: The minimum age is 18 years.
keywords: minimum age for employee visa

intents.name: Maximum age for employee visa
intents.response: The maximum age is 60 years.
keywords: maximum age for employee visa

intents.name: What are Meydan office timings
intents.response: We are operating 24/7.
keywords: what are meydan office timings

intents.name: Where is Meydan Free Zone office located
intents.response: Meydan Grandstand, 6th Floor, Meydan Road, Nad Al Sheba 1, Dubai, UAE.
keywords: where is meydan free zone office located

intents.name: Can client use Meydan PO Box
intents.response: It is not allowed; clients may apply for their own PO Box via Meydan Plus.
keywords: can client use meydan po box

intents.name: Can Meydan receive goods or packages for clients
intents.response: Deliveries are not accepted unless mail management services are registered.
keywords: can meydan receive goods or packages for clients

intents.name: Where is the Meydan share desk office
intents.response: Meydan Grandstand, 6th Floor, Meydan Road, Nad Al Sheba, Dubai, U.A.E.
keywords: where is the meydan share desk office
